description: 1993 26' Chris Craft Crowne 262 cabin cruiser with trailer for sale for $3,250.  Engine and outdrive are in good working condition.  Boat floats and drives.  It does need a real good cleaning, if it didn't I would be asking for $4000 to $5000 for it.  Cabin is in pretty decent condition with no rips or tears in the fabric of the cabin. The carpet is complete just need to be cleaned.  It will need a new canvas top as the only one on it is ripped all to hell.  The outside seats will need to be cleaned real good and possibly redone. It has the OMC King Cobra outdrive which if you know anything about outdrives is pretty much bulletproof.  The engine is a 351 V-8 with 265 HP.  All fluids have been checked every year for the past 8 or years by Brest Bay Marina service department with no issues whatsoever.  No water in the outdrive oil.  Winterized every year.  The boat has been docked and stored at Brest Bay Marina for the past 8 years.  The engine, outdrive and trailer are worth more than $3250 by themselves. The boat comes with a dual axle trailer that came with the boat when I bought it 8+ years ago.  I'm not 100% sure of the condition of the trailer as it has been in storage at Brest Bay Marine for the 8 years I've had it docked and stored there.  It was in really good condition when I last used it way back when.  I will make sure that the trailer is in good working condition and is road worthy for the buyer upon pickup. A good scrubbing and this boat would look great.  I just don't have the time to do anything with it and the wife wants it gone!  Price is pretty firm so if your interested or want to take a look at it - it is sitting outside in storage at Brest Bay Marina at 4088 Brest Rd, Newport, MI 48166.  It will have a big FOR SALE sign on it. Text me with questions at show contact info or call and leave a message.
title: 1993 Christ Craft Crowne 262

description: 50' DOCK AT TOLEDO BEACH MARINA FOR RENT: The dock is on the Put-In-Bay pier. It is ideally suited with drive up access (two parking spaces) and a picnic table on the grassy area at the end of the slip. This is one of the nicest docks in the whole marina as it has no obstructions behind it, making it extremely easy to maneuver your boat in and out. Also, it is near the mid point of the pier, meaning it is far enough from the entrance road to the marina so that noise from the car traffic is never a problem, but also far enough away from the bar, restaurant and marina channel that noise from boats and dinner patrons is not an issue either. text The swimming pool, showers, bath house and laundry facilities are located very close, at the end of the pier. Some of the amenities included with the dock are: 30 Amp and 50 Amp electrical service Free WiFi Two parking spaces (drive up) Fresh Water Grassy area with picnic table Dock box for storage Gas Dock and Pump Out on site Restaurant, Bar, Sandwich shop on site Marine Store on site, West Marine located 10 minutes away Pool, Bath House, Laundry Facilities
